TopicTitle: What's the key to exit IVA?

Articles.Content: I use the ' and + keys (which I use for switching between vessels) to exit the IVA camera view. But I'm sure that's not the way I'm supposed to do it.
'c' to change camera view back from IVA, 'v' to change which Kerbal's view you have in IVA.

Yep, "C" or "V" will generally do the trick.

What is this " ' " and "+" thing you speak of, isn't it "[" and "]"?

What keyboard layout do you have?

C will exit IVA

V will switch between kerbals in the IVA

(by default... and Ninja'd but I don't care, the spirit of ninja can't be denied)
